passives.name: Rebirth
passives.effects: Upon taking [[death|lethal damage]], enter {{tip|resurrection}} for 4 seconds, during which you are {{tip|invulnerable}}, {{tip|untargetable}}, and unable to act, and afterwards {{tip|heal}} for {{as|50% of '''base''' health}} and restore {{as|100% of '''maximum''' mana}} (300 second cooldown, starts after resurrection ends).

effects_structured.raw: Upon taking [[death lethal damage]], enter {{tip resurrection}} for 4 seconds, during which you are {{tip invulnerable}}, {{tip untargetable}}, and unable to act, and afterwards {{tip heal}} for {{as 50% of '''base''' health}} and restore {{as 100% of '''maximum''' mana}} (300 second cooldown, starts after resurrection ends).

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
